Package com.tecchtitans.eng1.screens

Class MainMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tecchtitans.eng1.screens.GameScreen
      • com.tecchtitans.eng1.screens.MainMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    public class MainMenu
extends GameScreen
    Initial main menu screen that can be used to exit the game or start a new game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MainMenu​(ENGGame game)
      Initialises the main menu screen with a reference to the current game instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void render​(float v)
      Renders the main menu map on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MainMenu

        public MainMenu​(ENGGame game)
        Initialises the main menu screen with a reference to the current game instance.
        Parameters:
        game - - Currently running game instance.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public void show()
        Code that runs upon the map being initially shown. Sets the map to be shown and any potential game audio if desired.

      • render

        public void render​(float v)
        Renders the main menu map on the screen. Checks for user input on the screen's button and performs the correct operation based upon the button pressed.
        Parameters:
        v - - Time passed since last frame in seconds. (delta time)
